description.value: When using a compositional expression consisting of multiple codes from SNOMED CT that describes a type of CDA document then, a code from the SNOMED CT UK Correspondence Document type subset with subset original id 44041000000135, and a code from the SNOMED CT UK Correspondence Care setting type subset with subset original id 43971000000130 can be used. This is DRAFT guidance. Further guidance on the format of the compositional expression TBA.
